item.title: Basic Inkscape Scientific Poster Design Workshop
item.description: This is a very brief initial workshop designed to introduce Inkscape. The main goal here is to get a general overview of how to create a poster layout with Inkscape, get familiar with the software, and understand a little about putting a scientific poster together. A pdf version of this workshop can be downloaded here. I’m aiming to have an online version of this workshop avaiable in the not too distant future, watch this space!

item.title: Considering Poster Design and Presentation
item.description: This is just a small comment piece I put together on [my] ideas behind the philosophy of design and scientific posters. It also includes quite a few links to sites and blogs that I have found useful and have got a lot of inspiration from. You can download these in pdf form here if you like printing documents to read later. I’m currently in the process of adding this material as an online post, so check back often!
